mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, email, username, password, hp, affiliation, is_active, role, join_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{email}, #{username}, #{password}, #{hp}, #{affiliation}, #{isActive, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{role}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, email, username, password, hp, affiliation, is_active AS isActive, role, join_at AS joinAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM user WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, hp = #{hp}, password = #{password}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE email = #{email}
